parsetree.*:
<root><template><title>RV</title><part><name>type</name>=<value>command

</value></part><part><name index="1"/><value> ofp

</value></part><part><name index="2"/><value>1.00

</value></part><part><name>arg</name>=<value> global

</value></part><part><name>gr1</name>=<value> Object Manipulation

</value></part><part><name>gr2</name>=<value> Sides

</value></part><part><name index="3"/><value> Returns the captive state of the given unit (set with [[setCaptive]]). A captive unit will not be attacked by its enemies.
<template lineStart="1"><title>Feature</title><part><name index="1"/><value>important</value></part><part><name index="2"/><value>
While a captive unit won't be attacked, it will still attack its enemies – be sure to [[setBehaviour]] "CARELESS" / [[removeAllWeapons]] accordingly.</value></part></template>

</value></part><part><name index="4"/><value> [[captive]] object

</value></part><part><name>p1</name>=<value> object: [[Object]] - unit or vehicle

</value></part><part><name index="5"/><value> [[Boolean]] - [[true]] if the unit is captive, [[false]] if not
		  
</value></part><part><name>x1</name>=<value> <code>[[if]] ([[captive]] _general) [[then]] { [[removeAllWeapons]] _general; };</code>

</value></part><part><name>seealso</name>=<value> [[captiveNum]], [[setCaptive]], [[side]]
</value></part></template>



[[Category:Scripting Commands OFP 1.99|CAPTIVE]]
[[Category:Scripting Commands OFP 1.96|CAPTIVE]]
[[Category:Scripting Commands OFP 1.46|CAPTIVE]]

<template lineStart="1"><title>GameCategory</title><part><name index="1"/><value>tkoh</value></part><part><name index="2"/><value>Scripting Commands</value></part></template></root>
